m_szDocTitle: How Will Tesla Motors (TSLA) Stock React to This Positive Analyst Note? - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet How Will Tesla Motors (TSLA) Stock React to This Positive Analyst Note? By Tony Owusu | 09/24/14 - 10:03 AM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Tesla Motors ( TSLA - Get Report ) is seeing sustainable growth in China, according to a note written by Goldman Sachs analyst Patrick Archambaul on Wednesday.  Archambaul calculated close to 4,000 reservations and down payments in the country for the company's Model S sedan as of the middle of September. : STOCKS TO BUY: TheStreet Quant Ratings has identified a handful of stocks that can potentially TRIPLE in the next 12 months. Learn more
